alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 2:16PM EST until November 21 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing Rain. Additional ice accumulations of up to light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While most of the area has warmed above freezing, several areas east of Keyser`s Ridge to Big Savage Mountain remain at or slightly below freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
